title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Pilatus PC-6 - Manually configure a flight plan
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can configure our flight plan manually in our navigation system from our Pilatus PC-6. 

The Route being configure will be from Jacqueline Cochran Regional Airport (KTRM) to a waypoint close to Indiana Wells. But to show the full potential of the Garmin GNS 430 we will modify our flight by adding a departure approach and changing active legs etc.
